resources.string: - The Home/Main Form module is main interface that displays all the reminders that you have been add. When you select a particular record, the preview of details will show and it has a choices, you will able to edit, archive, and delete/move to trash your selected record.

- The Add New Reminder is the interface that displays all the fields that you need to fill up in order to add a new reminder. You need to provide the Title of your reminder in the first field, next field is the Content, this will be the content of your reminder. The next field is the Select Time, when you click it, the Time Picker Dialog will show and you will select the time that you want. Last field is the Select Date, so the process of selecting a date is the same with Select Time, the only difference is the Date Picker Dialog.

- The Archive module is interface that displays all the archived data. When you select a particular archived data, the preview of details will show and it has a choices , you will able to edit, unarchive, and delete/move to trash your selected archived data.

- The Trash module is interface that displays all the trashed data. When you select a particular trashed data, the preview of details will show and it has a choices , you will able to restore or permanently deleted your selected trashed data.
